title: [GAME BREAKING Bug] In-Game: Can't move, type, use abilities, or do anything
body: I join a match then am unable to interact at all , including moving, typing, and using any skills or signals

replies.body: Sounds like you're being affected by that [**Discord Overlay**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-support/F1goweJo-i-cant-interact-with-the-game) many players have had troubles with! Be sure to disable the overlay, or simply disable Discord entirely, and test it in a custom game.
